page.title: 09Surroundings
page.content: The School is situated in close proximity to a railway line and a reservoir.This reservoir can't be seen from ground level, apart from its'top rim, which is a pity since it is said to attract many interesting forms of wildlife. The reservoir's primary function was to refill the tanks of the steam trains as they passed through, but it has since fallen into disuse. On the other side of the road is the station which is also disused. A fairly recent housing estate surrounds the school on two sides and the rest of the houses in the village line the main road.
